segments.text: Anna , that outfit looks wonderful on you ! The color goes with your trousers perfectly .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thanks , Carla . That's quite a compliment coming from you . You always dress so tastefully .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , that dress certainly shows your good taste . It must have cost a lot .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , not much . I got it on sale at the mall - 60 % off .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Really ? You're an amazing bargain hunter ! Next time there's a sale , promise you'll let me tag along with you .
segments.speaker: S1
